mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.gift_name AS "giftName", a.original_price AS "originalPrice", a.gift_price AS "giftPrice", a.goods_count AS "goodsCount", a.create_by AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u6 ON u6.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gift_config( id, gift_name, original_price, gift_price, goods_count, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{giftName}, #{originalPrice}, #{giftPrice}, #{goodsCount}, #{createBy.name}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.name}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gift_config SET gift_name = #{giftName}, original_price = #{originalPrice}, gift_price = #{giftPrice}, goods_count = #{goodsCount}, update_by = #{updateBy.name}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
